titles.title: Domestic Investment Economic Growth Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny the foreign tax credit and deduction for taxes paid in lieu of income taxes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the foreign tax credit and the deduction for taxes in lieu of income, war profits, or excess profits taxes imposed by a foreign country or U.S. possession.
